data.name: Luminus
data.detailed_description:
After a horrible accident, the haunted Benjamin’s only company is his battered teddy bear.
Together, you must find your way to safety, while solving puzzles and evading those that hide in the dark. Find ways to repair your bear to unlock its full potential, and discover new ways it can help you on your journey.

Features

  • Multiple hand-drawn levels
  • Solve puzzles to clear the way for you and your teddy bear
  • Evade the ghosts that chase you in the dark
  • Upgrade your bear to discover its new skills
  • Hug your bear to find comfort
  • Discover clues to a tragic story
  • Atmospheric music

Together, you must find your way to safety, while solving puzzles and evading those that hide in the dark. Find ways to repair your bear to unlock its full potential, and discover new ways it can help you on your journey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
